**Format:**

## Tasks
- [ ] obtain source
- [ ] fix bibliographic data
- [ ] rename document file
- [ ] add tags
- [ ] add to private group (keep tags, add citation key)
- [ ] (if needed) add PDF
- [ ] read and highlight source
- [ ] summarize source
- [ ] (optional) copy source to public group for bibliography
- [ ] take notes on source
